banner_details:
The banner is a four-quadrant layout with a soft pink aesthetic and a focus on elegance and femininity. The top-left quadrant includes a bold primary heading (`heading`) and a thin sans-serif subheading (`subheading`) layered over a pale pink background with a large blurred pink circle accent. The top-right quadrant features the `product_image`, showcasing rose gold and diamond-styled earrings centered within soft pink surroundings. The bottom-left quadrant provides product information (`description`) and prominently displays the price (`price`) followed by a strong rectangular call-to-action button (`cta_button_bg` and `cta`). Soft curves and minimalistic patterns are incorporated throughout the background.  

**Color Palette:**  
- #FFF5F5 (Main Background)  
- #FFEAED (Top-Left Background)  
- #FFD6DB (Top-Right Background)  
- #FFB6C1 (Bottom-Left Background)  
- #FADDE1 (Bottom-Right Background)  
- #853E43 (Heading & Price Text)  
- #B25559 (Subheading Text)  
- #5D2A2C (Description Text)  
- #9A3C41 (CTA Button Background)  
- #FFFFFF (CTA Button Text)  
- #F47983 (Accent Large Circles)  
- #F8A3A8 (Accent Small Circles)  
- #E57F84 (Wave Lines)
product_color: The product image showcases elegant earrings featuring a delicate rose gold base (#F4A6AA), complemented by soft blush pink enamel (#FAD4D4) and brilliant white gemstones (#FFFFFF). The rose gold forms the structure and floral outlines, creating a warm and luxurious feel. The blush pink teardrop shapes add feminine softness, while the high-luster gemstones provide striking contrast and sparkle. The colors are seamlessly blended—rose gold transitions gracefully to pink without overpowering the gemstones, which are strategically placed to highlight and reflect light. This harmonious palette can be used in the advertisement banner to evoke sophistication, elegance, and charm.
